00025 template< typename Container, typename Criteria>
00026 void erExtractPoints( IplImage *im, Container &pts, Criteria crit,CvRect rect=cvRect(0,0,0,0), uint delta=1)
00027 {  
00028   typedef typename Container::value_type CvPoint;;
00029   int y, x;
00030   for( y = 0; y < im->height; y+=delta)
00031     { 
00032       for( x = 0; x < im->width; x+=delta)
00033         { 
00034           CvScalar a = cvGet2D(im,y,x);
00035           if(crit(a.val[0]))
00036             { 
00037               CvPoint p;
00038               p.x = x+rect.x;
00039               p.y = y+rect.y;
00040               pts.push_back(p); 
00041 
00042             }
00043         }
00044     }
00045 };
00046 //int* ptr = (int*)(im->imageData + y*im->widthStep ); (linea de commando alternativa, va entre los for)

00061 template< typename Container>
00062 void erExtractionCurveUser( IplImage* simag, erCerc* cerc, char** file_name, Container &pts, CvRect recROI)
00063 {
00064 
00065   //typedef Container typeContainer;
00066   typedef std::map< double, Container> erMap;
00067   erMap ptsMap;
00068   typename erMap::iterator iterMap;
00069   typename Container::iterator iterV_polyvalent, iterV_pts;
00070   
00071   for( iterV_polyvalent = pts.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != pts.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00072     {
00073       ptsMap[iterV_polyvalent->x].push_back(*iterV_polyvalent);
00074     }
00075   pts.clear();
00076   
00077       std::pair< CvPoint, int> cercle = erCvDebutCurve( simag);
00078       cerc->centro = cercle.first;
00079       cerc->radio = cercle.second;
00080       CvPoint p_polyvalent;
00081       std::vector< int> ptsDmin, ptsY0;
00082       std::vector< int>::iterator iterDmin;
00083       bool Dmin = false;
00084       int a = 0, b = 0, c = 0;
00085       iterMap = ptsMap.begin();
00086       for( iterV_polyvalent = iterMap->second.begin(); iterV_polyvalent != iterMap->second.end(); iterV_polyvalent++)
00087         {
00088           a = abs( iterV_polyvalent->y - cercle.first.y);
00089           if( a <= cercle.second)
00090             {
00091               if( a < b || Dmin==false)
00092                 {
00093                   c = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00094                   Dmin = true;
00095                   b = a;
00096                 }
00097             }
00098         }
00099       if( Dmin)
00100         {
00101           
00102           p_polyvalent.x = iterMap->first;
00103           p_polyvalent.y = c;
00104          
00105           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00106 
00107         }
00108       else
00109         {
00110 
00111           std::ofstream file( nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00112           file << file_name[2] << std::endl;
00113           file << std::endl;
00114           pts.clear();
00115           return; 
00116         }
00117       int A=0;
00118       iterMap++;
00119       for( ; iterMap != ptsMap.end(); iterMap++)
00120         { 
00121           CvPoint cpt = pts.back();
00122           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y));
00123           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00124             { 
00125               iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00126               if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00127                 {
00128                   iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00129                   if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end())
00130                     {
00131                       iterMap--;
00132                       iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y + 1));
00133                       if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==-1)
00134                         {
00135                           iterV_polyvalent = erFindCvPoint( iterMap->second.begin(), iterMap->second.end(), cvPoint( iterMap->first, cpt.y - 1));
00136                           if( iterV_polyvalent == iterMap->second.end() || A==1)
00137                             {
00138 
00139                               std::ofstream file( nameGoodImagesFile(INFOFILE), std::ios_base::app );
00140                               file << file_name[2] << std::endl;
00141                               file << std::endl;
00142                               pts.clear();
00143                               return;
00144                             }
00145                           else
00146                             {
00147                               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00148                               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00149                               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00150                              
00151                               A=-1;
00152                             }
00153                         }
00154                       else
00155                         {
00156                           p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00157                           p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00158                           pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00159                           
00160                           A=1;
00161                         }
00162                     }
00163                   else
00164                     {
00165                       p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00166                       p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00167                       pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00168                      
00169                       A=0;
00170                     }
00171                 }
00172               else
00173                 {
00174                   p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00175                   p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00176                   pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00177                  
00178                   A=0;
00179                 }
00180             }
00181           else
00182             {
00183               p_polyvalent.x = iterV_polyvalent->x;
00184               p_polyvalent.y = iterV_polyvalent->y;
00185               pts.push_back( p_polyvalent);
00186               
00187               A=0;
00188             }
00189         }
00190      
00191       for( iterV_pts = pts.begin(); iterV_pts != pts.end(); iterV_pts++)
00192         {
00193           iterV_pts->x = iterV_pts->x + recROI.x;
00194           iterV_pts->y = iterV_pts->y + recROI.y;
00195         }

00334 template< typename Container>
00335 void erConvertPixelToMks( std::pair< double, double> factor, Container &pts, char** file_name)
00336 {
00337   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00338   bool good_format;const char* num;
00339   boost::tie(good_format,num) = erGetNumberInFileName(file_name[2]);
00340 
00341 
00342   if(good_format)
00343     {
00344       char* new_name = erConcatenateFileName(file_name[1],"_data_",num,".txt");     
00345       //Ouverture du fichier
00346       std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00347       if (myfile.is_open())
00348         {
00349           //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00350           typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00351           Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00352           Iterator fin=pts.end();
00353           
00354           for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00355             {
00356               myfile << deb->x*factor.first << "  " << deb->y*factor.second << std::endl;
00357             }     
00358           myfile.close();
00359         }
00360       else 
00361         {
00362           std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00363         }
00364     }
00365   else
00366     {
00367       std::cout << "error in format input file images";
00368     } 
00369 };

00374 template< typename Container>
00375 void erEcriturePointPixel( Container &pts, char** file_name)
00376 {
00377   //Ecriture du nom du ficher 
00378   char* new_name = erEcrireNomFicher( file_name, "_curve_");
00379 
00380   //Ouverture du ficher
00381   std::ofstream myfile( new_name);
00382   if (myfile.is_open())
00383     {
00384       //Ecriture des donnes dans le ficher
00385       typedef typename Container::iterator Iterator;
00386       Iterator deb=pts.begin();
00387       Iterator fin=pts.end();
00388       
00389       for(;deb!=fin;deb++)
00390         {
00391           
00392           myfile << deb->x << "  " << deb->y << std::endl;
00393         }         
00394       myfile.close();
00395     }
00396   else 
00397     {
00398       std::cout << "Unable to open file";
00399     }
00400 };

00403 // ATTENTION Test uniquement sur y precise a quoi sert cette fonction
00404 template< typename Iterator>
00405 Iterator erFindCvPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CvPoint punto)
00406 {
00407   while(p1 != p2)
00408     {
00409       if( p1->y == punto.y)
00410         {
00411           return p1;
00412           break;
00413         }
00414       p1++;
00415     }
00416   return p2;
00417 };
